text: Giordano Colausig (born December 16, 1940 in Gradisca d'Isonzo) is a retired Italian professional football player. He played for 7 seasons (89 games, 7 goals) in the Serie A for L.R. Vicenza, A.S. Roma and Brescia Calcio. ==External links== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:L.R. title: Giordano Colausig
